mapper.select: SELECT sps.store_prod_id AS store_product_id, SUM( img_search_count ) AS img_search_count FROM store_product_statistics sps WHERE sps.del_flag = 0 AND sps.voucher_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY sps.store_prod_id ORDER BY img_search_count DESC Limit 100

SELECT store_prod_id, store_id, SUM(IFNULL( img_search_count, 0 )) AS count FROM store_product_statistics WHERE del_flag = 0 AND voucher_date BETWEEN #{oneMonthAgo} AND #{yesterday} GROUP BY store_prod_id, store_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT store_prod_id, store_id, SUM(IFNULL( download_count, 0 )) AS count FROM store_product_statistics WHERE del_flag = 0 AND voucher_date BETWEEN #{oneMonthAgo} AND #{yesterday} GROUP BY store_prod_id, store_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
